All ages welcome (Children must be accompanied and supervised by an adult). Renew Wellbeing Café every Tuesday for adults who have mild mental health difficulties and/or are looking for a sociable place to meet people. There are opportunities to share a hobby, learn a new one, play board games, enjoy the peace in a quiet area or chat and relax over refreshments.

properties.description: - Children and Youth Area - Community Room - Free computer and Internet access with scanning and printing available - Free WiFi - Photocopier - Fax service Weekly Activities for Adults: · Knitting Group · Colouring and Jigsaw Club · Crochet Club on Thursday · Coffee Morning on Friday · Caffi Cymraeg for Welsh learners The Barry Friends and Neighbours Group Credit Union meetings Weekly Activities for Children: · Rhyme and Sign - Singing sessions using baby signing for ages 12mths-4 years · Bounce and Rhyme - Singing sessions for children aged newborn-12 months · Children's Colouring Club for 5 years+ · Amser Stori with Menter Iaith Bro Morgannwg, · Tylino Babi (Baby Massage) with Cymraeg i Blant Bro Morgannwg · Storytime - Story and craft for 2-5-year-olds · Lego Club - Ages 6+
